alert.note: Alert for Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 12:41AM EDT until July 11 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Warner River At Davisville affecting Merrimack County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Warner River at Davisville. * WHEN...From this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Riverside Road floods along with increasing depths over recreational fields in Warner. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:31 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet this morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
